Question
========
The change in the direction of waves at the boundary between two different media is


Answerlist
----------
* refraction
* reflection
* rarefaction
* resonance
* diffraction
* interference
* superposition


Solution
========
Refraction is the change in the direction of waves at the boundary between two different media.
